content.en: Used Claude to reconstruct the Blog project, deployed on Cloudflare, managed content with Sveltia CMS, built GitHub Oauth service on Cloudflare Worker, Claude Code is really powerful~
content.zh: 使用 Claude 重构了 Blog 项目，部署在 Cloudflare 上，使用Sveltia CMS 管理内容，在Cloudflare Worker自建 github Oauth 服务，Claude Code 实在是太强了~
